程序包 org.apache.giraph.master

Package of all the master related things.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    MasterAggregatorUsage
    Master compute can access and change aggregators through this interface
    MasterObserver
    Observer for Master.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BspServiceMaster<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    ZooKeeper-based implementation of CentralizedServiceMaster.
    BspServiceMaster.FinalizedCheckpointPathFilter
    Only get the finalized checkpoint files
    DefaultMasterCompute
    A dumb implementation of MasterCompute.
    DefaultMasterObserver
    A no-op implementation of MasterObserver to make it easier for users.
    MasterAggregatorHandler
    Handler for aggregators on master
    MasterCompute
    Interface for defining a master vertex that can perform centralized computation between supersteps.
    MasterInfo
    Information about the master that is sent to other workers.
    MasterThread<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Master thread that will coordinate the activities of the tasks.
